# stop(atTime:)

**Instance Method**

Stops playing the pattern at the specified time.

## Declaration

```swift
func stop(atTime time: TimeInterval) throws
```

## Parameters

- **time**: The time at which to stop playing the pattern.

## Discussion

If `time` is `0` or any value less than the haptic engine’s [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEngine/currentTime], the pattern stops playing immediately.

## Starting and Stopping Playback

- **start(atTime:)**: Starts playing the pattern at the specified time.
- **cancel()**: Stops the pattern player immediately and returns the specified error.
